html:
Oct 12 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Fevertree Drinks, Lancashire Holdings and Teamviewer, on Tuesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Fnac Darty SA FNAC.PA: Bryan Garnier raises to buy from neutral

* Fevertree Drinks Plc FEVR.L: HSBC cuts to hold from buy

* Lancashire Holdings LRE.L: Peel Hunt raises to add from hold

* Sodexo EXHO.PA: Bernstein raises to outperform from market-perform

* Teamviewer AG TMV.DE: Deutsche Bank cuts to hold from buy

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Tuesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* Abrdn Plc ABDN.L: Citigroup cuts price target to 280p from 305p

* Adevinta ASA ADEA.OL: Morgan Stanley raises target price to NOK 185 from NOK 160

* Alfa Financial Software Holdings ALFAAL.L: Barclays raises to overweight from equal weight

* Anima Holding SpA ANIM.MI: UBS raises to buy from neutral
